citations.narrative:
***A USDA APHIS Official conducted a search at Jayell Ranch on 02/15/23 and found the facility is exhibiting a Capuchin.
The Owner of the property was not present but the attendant was able to contact the owner by phone. USDA spoke with
the owner and reminded him that, as discussed previously, a USDA license is required to exhibit an exotic animal and he
his continuing to conduct regulated activity without first obtaining a USDA license. USDA reminded the owner that the
Capuchin should be removed from public exhibition until a license is obtained.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A VALID USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attendant and the Owner.
End Section

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
***A USDA APHIS Official conducted a search at Jayell Ranch on 02/15/23 and found the facility is exhibiting a Capuchin. 
The Owner of the property was not present but the attendant was able to contact the owner by phone. USDA spoke with 
the owner and reminded him that, as discussed previously, a USDA license is required to exhibit an exotic animal and he 
his continuing to conduct regulated activity without first obtaining a USDA license. USDA reminded the owner that the 
Capuchin should be removed from public exhibition until a license is obtained.  
 
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A VALID USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attendant and the Owner. 
 
End Section
